turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me Can you get me a coffee order from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just want a venti Caffe Americano.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me a glass of skimmed milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, no whipped cream no sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti americano with skim milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it. On the Starbucks on Donahue Street in Sausalito.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks donnahue st.
